mapper.select: select surveyGroupNo, companyNo, max(surveyDate) as surveyDate, max(manager) as manager, (select companyName from company where survey.companyNo = company.companyNo) as companyName, (select round(avg(satisVal*20)) from survey as ss where ss.surveyGroupNo = surveyGroupNo and ss.companyNo = survey.companyNo and type = 1) as satisfaction from survey where survey.surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} group by companyNo order by surveyDate
SELECT COUNT(quesName) FROM survey WHERE surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} AND type = 1 group by companyNo
